根.definition: root; basis; classifier for long slender objects, e.g. cigarettes, guitar strings; CL:條|条[tiao2]; radical (chemistry)

根底.definition: foundation; grounding; background; what lies at the bottom of sth; root; cause

根插.definition: to plant roots; to propagate from root cuttings

根據.definition: according to; based on; basis; foundation; CL:個|个[ge4]

根據規定.definition: according to provisions; as stipulated in the rules

根本.definition: fundamental; basic; root; simply; absolutely (not); (not) at all; CL:個|个[ge4]

根本法.definition: fundamental law; body of basic laws

根河.definition: Genhe, county-level city, Mongolian Gegeen-gol xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia

根河市.definition: Genhe, county-level city, Mongolian Gegeen-gol xot, in Hulunbuir 呼倫貝爾|呼伦贝尔[Hu1 lun2 bei4 er3], Inner Mongolia

根治.definition: to bring under permanent control; to effect a radical cure

根深葉茂.definition: deep roots and vigorous foliage (idiom); (fig.) well established and growing strongly

根由.definition: the whys and the wherefores; the detailed story; root cause

根究.definition: to investigate (sth) thoroughly; to get to the bottom of
